executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Test the complete end-to-end RFP submission workflow using this specific BeaconBid RFP URL:
https://www.beaconbid.com/solicitations/city-of-houston/a03e5701-7cba-41b8-b889-daea331fb556/multi-year-public-facing-regional-websites

Critical Testing Configuration:
1. Backend API endpoint: http://localhost:5001/api (ensure tests hit the correct port!)
2. Frontend UI: http://localhost:5173
3. AI Models: Use GPT-5.1 for content generation and Claude Sonnet 4.5 for technical analysis
4. Quality threshold for proposals: 0.8 (80%)

Complete Test Flow (Execute in Order):

TC002 - Manual RFP Creation from BeaconBid URL:
- POST to http://localhost:5001/api/rfps/manual
- Body: {"url": "https://www.beaconbid.com/solicitations/city-of-houston/a03e5701-7cba-41b8-b889-daea331fb556/multi-year-public-facing-regional-websites", "userNotes": "Multi-year public-facing regional websites for City of Houston"}
- Expected: 201 status, RFP created with metadata from BeaconBid
- Validate: RFP title, agency (City of Houston), deadline, estimated value

TC008 - Document Processing & Requirement Extraction:
- POST to http://localhost:5001/api/documents/{rfpId}/parse
- Wait for document download from BeaconBid (PDF/Word files)
- Use Claude Sonnet 4.5 for AI-powered requirement extraction
- Expected: All RFP documents downloaded and parsed
- Validate: Requirements list, compliance checklist items, key dates

TC003 - Enhanced AI Proposal Generation:
- POST to http://localhost:5001/api/proposals/enhanced/generate
- Body: {"rfpId": "{from TC002}", "options": {"generatePricing": true, "generateCompliance": true, "qualityThreshold": 0.8}}
- Use GPT-5.1 for creative content (executive summary, technical narrative)
- Expected: 202 status, proposal generation started
- Monitor SSE stream for progress updates
- Validate: Executive summary, technical approach, pricing section, quality score >= 0.8

TC005 - Submission Pipeline Start:
- First create a submission: POST to http://localhost:5001/api/submissions
- Body: {"rfpId": "{from TC002}", "proposalData": {from TC003}}
- Then start pipeline: POST to http://localhost:5001/api/submissions/pipeline/start
- Body: {"submissionId": "{from previous}", "browserOptions": {"headless": false, "timeout": 120000}}
- Expected: 202 status, submission workflow started
- Validate: Portal authentication, document upload process, form filling

TC007 - Real-time Progress Tracking:
- Monitor WebSocket/SSE streams throughout the entire workflow
- Verify progress updates for: RFP creation, document parsing, proposal generation, submission
- Expected: Real-time status updates at each workflow stage
- Validate: Accurate progress percentages, completion notifications

Expected End-to-End Results:
✓ RFP created from BeaconBid URL with complete metadata
✓ All RFP documents downloaded (PDFs, Word docs, attachments)
✓ Requirements extracted with AI (minimum 10 requirements identified)
✓ Compliance matrix generated (100% requirement coverage)
✓ AI proposal generated with quality score >= 0.8:
  - Executive summary (200-300 words)
  - Technical approach (500-1000 words)
  - Pricing/bid amount calculated based on requirements
✓ Submission created and pipeline initiated
✓ Real-time progress tracking working throughout
✓ Complete workflow completes in < 10 minutes

Key Validation Points:
- All API calls use http://localhost:5001/api (NOT 5173!)
- Response formats match expected schema
- Error handling works for invalid inputs
- Quality scores meet threshold
- Documents are properly stored in object storage
- Real-time updates are received via WebSocket/SSE
- Browser automation successfully navigates BeaconBid portal
